Explore Careers by Educational Path

Not ready for the quiz? Start by exploring careers that share similar skills and interests. Careers are grouped by the most common educational path.

College

Software Developer

Career Pathway: Technology

Ideal for your logical approach to creating and building systems.

Median Salary: $132,270

Typical Education: Bachelor’s degree

Job Outlook: Much faster than average (25%)

Common Skills: Problem-solving, Coding, Software Testing, Agile Methodologies, Debugging

Learn more from BLS (15-1256)

Architect

Career Pathway: Art & Design

Perfect for designing complex structures with precision and vision.

Median Salary: $97,270

Typical Education: Bachelor’s degree in Architecture

Job Outlook: Slower than average (1%)

Common Skills: Design thinking, AutoCAD/Revit, Visualization, Building Codes, Project Management

Learn more from BLS (17-1011)

Data Scientist

Career Pathway: Technology

Suits your analytical mind in uncovering insights from data.

Median Salary: $108,700

Typical Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s in Data Science, Statistics, or CS

Job Outlook: Much faster than average (35%)

Common Skills: Data analysis, Python/R, Machine learning, Statistical Modeling, SQL

Learn more from BLS (15-2051)

Academic Researcher

Career Pathway: Research & Academia

Fits your desire to delve deep into subjects and uncover new knowledge.

Median Salary: $84,380

Typical Education: Master’s or Ph.D.

Job Outlook: Faster than average (8%)

Common Skills: Research methodology, Statistical analysis, Academic writing, Critical Thinking, Grant Writing

Learn more from BLS (25-1000)

Engineer (R&D)

Career Pathway: Engineering

Great for applying logical principles to design and build solutions.

Median Salary: $105,970

Typical Education: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering

Job Outlook: Faster than average (6%)

Common Skills: Problem-solving, Design, Analytical thinking, Innovation, Prototyping

Learn more from BLS (17-2199)

Philosopher/Theorist

Career Pathway: Research & Academia

Matches your love for exploring fundamental questions and concepts.

Median Salary: $84,380

Typical Education: Ph.D.

Job Outlook: Faster than average (8%)

Common Skills: Critical thinking, Logic, Argumentation, Writing, Abstract Reasoning

Learn more from BLS (25-1126)

Business Executive

Career Pathway: Business & Management

Ideal for steering organizations and implementing strategic visions.

Median Salary: $206,420

Typical Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree

Job Outlook: Slower than average (3%)

Common Skills: Strategic planning, Financial management, Leadership, Decision Making, Vision Setting

Learn more from BLS (11-1011)

Career Pathway: Legal

Suits your argumentative skill and ability to lead complex cases.

Median Salary: $145,760

Typical Education: Juris Doctor (J.D.)

Job Outlook: Faster than average (8%)

Common Skills: Legal research, Argumentation, Negotiation, Client Counseling, Writing

Learn more from BLS (23-1011)

Management Consultant

Career Pathway: Consulting

Perfect for analyzing businesses and guiding them to success.

Median Salary: $99,440

Typical Education: Bachelor's degree (often MBA preferred)

Job Outlook: Faster than average (10%)

Common Skills: Problem-solving, Data analysis, Communication, Strategic Thinking, Presentation Skills

Learn more from BLS (13-1111)

Entrepreneur

Career Pathway: Business & Management

Great for taking initiative and building new ventures from the ground up.

Median Salary: $102,950

Typical Education: Varies (often Bachelor's in Business)

Job Outlook: Average (5%)

Common Skills: Innovation, Risk-taking, Networking, Business Acumen, Adaptability, Problem-solving
